DEFAULT.question: I want to know my demat account details.
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
1. Go to Basic Details
2. On the bottom, you will see the DPID Your DP ID is your DEMAT account number.

DEFAULT.question: How much does Groww charge for stocks?
DEFAULT.answer:
Account opening = Rs 0
Annual maintenance charge (AMC) = Rs 0
Brokerage = Rs 20 or 0.05% per order (whichever is lower)

Regulatory & statutory charges, penalties, and GST is extra and depends on the type of order.  

You can use the brokerage calculator to get an estimate of all the charges involved. 

Also, you can know all about our charges by reading our pricing section in detail. 

Select the buttons below to go to the brokerage calculator or pricing page.

DEFAULT.question: Can I buy IPO on Groww?
DEFAULT.answer: Yes, you can buy IPO on Groww. Press the button below to go to the IPO page.

DEFAULT.question: Is there any rule for limit price of an order?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: As per exchange guidelines, you can buy or sell a stock within a certain range. This range is displayed to you when you're placing a buy or sell limit order.

DEFAULT.question: Can I transfer my Demat holdings to my Groww account?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Yes, you can move your stocks to Groww. 

To know how to move your stocks to Groww, press the button below and read the blog.

DEFAULT.question: When will I get the money after selling stocks?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: As per SEBI guidelines, the money will get credited to your Groww Balance 2 working days after your transaction (T+2 days).

DEFAULT.question: My issue is not listed here.
DEFAULT.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
